metadata.title: CVE-2021-33460 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in yasm version 1.3.0. There is a NULL pointerdereference in if_condition() in modules/preprocs/nasm/nasm-pp.c.

criterions.comment: yasm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
